metadata.title: CVE-2016-8859 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Multiple integer overflows in the TRE library and musl libc allow attackers to cause memory corruption via a large number of (1) states or (2) tags, which triggers an out-of-bounds write.

criterions.comment: musl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.19-2').
tre package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.0-6').
